text: Lina Marcela Hernández (born 4 January 1999) is a Colombian track and road racing cyclist. She competed at the 2021 UCI Road World Championships, in the women's time trial event and women's road race event. She won the road race at the 2021 Pan American Road and Track Championships. == References == Category:1999 births Category:Colombian cyclists Category:Living people
title: Lina Marcela Hernández
